body.name: Bgears b-Optillusion Gaming PC ATX case, Special Optical Illusion ARGB Front Panel, Tempered Glass Side. USB3.0, Support up to EATX Motherboard. Fan Not Included.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 4 hrs 23 mins
features: Mesmerizing Optical Illusion effect Front ARGB Panel
Massive Airflow design can install up to 8 fans
Support WaterCooling: Front 240mm or 360mm, Top-240mm or 280mm, Rear-120mm.
For Front Panel LED Connection Guide, please check website
body.description: Bgears b-Optillusion Gaming PC ATX case with Optical illusion lighting effect ARGB Front Panel. Tinted side tempered glass panel for easy access to the inside of the Chassis. Strong 0.5mm thick Chassis body. Separate chamber for power supply design for better cooling. Support EATX/ATX/MicroATX/ITX motherboards. Support water-cooling: Front 240mm or 360mm, Top 240mm or 280mm, Rear-120mm. USB 3 0 x 1/ USB 2 0 x 2/ Mic/ HD Audio cable length 750 mm. Support up to 8 fans for cooling 3 x 120mm or 2x 140mm Front (Not Included), 2 x 120mm top (Not Included), 1 x 120mm rear (Not Included). Support CPU cooler height up to 160mm. Support VGA card up to 300mm (max 300mm if Front Fan installed). Magnetic Dust cover on top panel and PVC filter at PSU location. Support 1 x 3.5” HDD, 2 x 2 5” SSD, 7 PCI slot.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features: Intrigue optical illusion front panel designARGB LED front panel with Multi-mode setting5mm thickness tinted Tempered Glass side panelExtreme Airflow design support up to 8 fansSupport water cooling up to 360mm radiatorSupport EATX, ATX, MicroATX, ITX motherboard

Specifications: Chassis Thickness: 0.5mm Black interior Motherboards: E-ATX/ATX/Micro-ATX/ITX Dimension: Internal: 212(W) x 330(D) x 470(H) mm, Overall: 212(W) x 380(D) x 480(H)mm Front Panel: ABS + Glass + Mirror + Mirror LED (Controlled by LED button) Side Panels: Left: Tinted Tempered Glass with 4 screws, Right: Steel Drive Bay HDD: 1 HDD + 2 SSD I/O Port: USB 3.0 x 1 / USB 2.0 x 2 / Mic / HD AUDIO, Cable Length 750mm + AUDIO 750 mm Fan Front: 3 x 120mm or 3 x 140mm (Not included) This model support: 120mm x 1 if install with EATX M/B (Max 275mm) Fan Top: 2 x 120mm or 2 x 140mm (Not included) Fan Rear: 1 x 120mm (Not included) PSU Chamber: 2 x 120mm (Not included) CPU Cooler Height: Max. 160mm VGA Card Length: Max. 300mm Water Cooling: front 240mm or 360mm, top 240mm or 280mm, rear 120mm Expansion Slots: 7 PSU Compatibility: Standard ATX (PSU Not Included)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible Value for the price
reviews.reviewText: First off this looks amazing! Installation was super easy because of the roomy space it has. The pre installed fans are nice but can get pretty noisy after some time especially after things start to heat up. Maybe the only downside is the small holes for the front fans restricting the air but besides this, its a great value for the price would highly recommend if your looking for something not as boring as a normal case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best artistic, rugged, spacious, reasonably priced computer case I've had in 30 years
reviews.reviewText: Could not imagine a more unique colorful excellently designed computer case design that is easy to install with its great access and spacious compartments. This is for my wife's birthday and is very compatible with her love of two ways mirrors that are a unique part of the design for the front face- She loves it. The two glass mirror front and the large glass side panel make the total weight heavier than most but provides the feel of a rugged case design. The flat black finish on all compartments and surfaces of the case add a quality appearance. The LED controls were a little confusing at first until it was pointed out that extra wiring is provided for total simultaneous control of all lights installed in the computer if desired. If not only the power cable is needed for the internal two way mirror LED lights to operate normally. Glad I saw this on Amazon and with a quick two day delivery.;

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looks great. Definitely worth the ~$50 I spent. No fans, but I wanted to cram as many in it as I could (8 total or 6 and a 2 fan CPU cooler). Really like the mirror finish on the front. The inside is spacious and I've had a variety of motherboards in it with no issue. It isn't as deep front to back as I would like but there is enough room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the best quality materials, but looks stunning.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It is made with cheap looking plastic and metal, however, the mirror effect is stunning. I somehow fit a very large build into this tiny case! It is mid-tax, but is pretty small. Which is what I was looking for. It fit my 4 drives, 3 fan AIO, 6 fans, RTX 3090. A lot of bang for such a small footprint. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good case for the price just wish I could use the front lights for the mirror effect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOOKS LIKE A MILLION BUCKS
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I freaking love this case. Looks amazing! The case exceeded my expectations -it’s beautiful looks super expensive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great looks, poor thermals and loud
reviews.reviewText: Fans are fairly loud but pretty. The front panel does not have enough clearance to move air into case, making push-pull impossible. The entire front is solid to accommodate the infinity lighting. The lower brace does have vents to pull air above power supply cutout, so updraft is hard. I personally voided warranty by drilling my own lower intake fan air vents. No space to route wiring on side if using non-modular PSU. No covers over backplane slots. This case has three fans and RGB controller with remote, so looks are trend setting. If your build is not structured to control heat, this is a great showpiece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nothing like a littler flair to your setup
reviews.reviewText: I built with this case obviously for aesthetics as there are very little infinity mirror cases sadly. As my altar to Zenitsu here, he can fit in the case but I just don’t want air flow to be impeded. Thermals are fine, I just have the case open and top mesh removed bc this new graphics card I got on sale, this 3090ti gets so damn hot, I’m afraid it’ll get too hot. I think it’ll be the same for any mid tower case unfortunately. But you’re not buying this case for that, are you?Maybe next year I’ll move it to something bigger to properly house this build but a pc case and GPU upgrade is all you really need to feel like you have a new computer.Anyways, I’m getting off topic. The CPU cooler is a Vetroo U6PRO, which was unintentionally matching the whole “X” theme. I like how the case has a LED button right on top, really easy to changeI like the added “USB C port on top” as optional but I can’t for the life of me find the actual cable online that I would need for that. Comes with 4 pretty good fans, plenty of space for wiring. The usb hub for the fans and leds is massive. I have like 9 fans going into that thing, major plus. Save yourself the hassle and use some double sided tape to move it around to better optimize cable placement.The only things I don’t like are that the bottom feet are foam and not rubber so it slides easily on hard wood. May be a pro or con depends on who you ask. Also the back gpu slots weren’t screwed on. They don’t just screw them on and off like other cases. Weird little quirk. You literally have to pop them off like they’re pringle can lids. Can be sharp so I would suggest using pliers. Make sure you take off the right ones because you can’t take them off if you do.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bgears b-BlackWidow-RGB White Gaming PC ATX case
reviews.reviewText: Best looking and works great! Bgears b-BlackWidow-RGB White Gaming PC ATX case

reviews.reviewTitle: It's my second time ordering the same case
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Stop searching for the best looking case I've been seeking the whole internet for about 15hours for my new build but have to reorder this one as its look is simply unbeatable i have not received my second one yet but the picture and video is from my previous exact same case buy with confidence and i highly recommend to place your fan on the front behind the argb panel to achieve the best airflow as there are vents in the side so you should not worry at all :)
Easy to set up. Looks beautiful!
